Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Crusher17
Reviews.Content: I was one of those guys still carrying around a flip phone.  I liked the idea of a smart phone, but I didn't want to be like most people and walk around all day like some idiot with some huge device in my hand.  Also, as I man, I don't want to carry a purse.  I needed something small to fit in my pocket and this phone is it.  Even better, I was able to find a prepaid service with 2 cent a minute calls (LycaMobile if anyone is interested) and since the phone is unlocked I can use free wifi for calls and data in most places.  My phone bills are less than $10 / month!  The battery life has been good.  Camera is fine just for viewing on the phone itself, but you wouldn't be printing and framing anything from this phone-- the resolution is only 2mp.  For those new to Android, it takes some putzing to get things just right with all the settings/options, but not that big of a deal.  Great phone!

Reviews.Title: Great small phone
Reviews.Author: Allan Cantor
Reviews.Content: Everything I was looking for in a phone. Small so fits easily in pocket, loud enough to hear, good battery life (a couple days), Android 4, good screen. Camera not great but not important to me.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: A. Camara
Reviews.Content: Exactly what i was looking for.  I had the Y5360 previously, and i never had a problem, but i wanted an update of the phone.  The s5301 comes with more memory ( 4g ),  works great with my carrier ( telcel ). Good phone, highly recommended if you want a cheap phone with 4g memory and android ice cream sandwich.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Pocket Plus S5301
Reviews.Author: Andranik Araratyan
Reviews.Content: I have no experience of using it, because I had to return it. Just want to warn you to pay attention to the fact that many sellers are advertising S5301, but actually sending S5301L instead. The difference is 3G band (850 / 1900 instead of 900 / 2100). If this does matter for you better contact the seller before placing an order and make sure what they really sell under the name of "S5301" model.

Reviews.Title: Hard-to-find Pocket Smartphone Is Right Size for Comfort and Convenience
Reviews.Author: zci
Reviews.Content: In the USA market it is difficult to find a small smartphone that comfortably fits in pockets. The prevailing sentiment seems to be bigger is better, and the phones just keep increasing in size. On Samsung's North American site the S5301L is unlisted. To find information about it (such as the instruction manual to download), you have to go to Samsung's Latin America site (http://www.samsung.com/latin_en/consumer/mobile-phones/mobile-phones/smartphone/GT-S5301ZILTTT-support). So for those interested in this device, know that Samsung markets the phone for use in countries outside USA.Very happy that I kept looking and found this particular phone. It's a big upgrade from an old flip phone that I used primarily because of its convenient size. This unlocked version is easy to activate with Ptel's prepaid service, and smooth connectivity is likely with any GSM network carrier.For me Android 4.0.4 Ice Cream sandwich is plenty powerful. It's an API level 15 in the Android chain (current Android version is 4.4 KitKat, Level 19), so this phone's OS is still a recent generation. Samsung's S5301 release was 2012.The $100 price is a great value. After shopping extensively and comparing the devices offered by many prepaid carriers, this unlocked phone offers much more for far less than any of the so-called "specials" you'll find in the stores of major carriers such as AT&T; and T-Mobil, as well as MVNO's like Cricket, Ptel, TracFone, etc.As far as features, advise that you do your own research. Numerous Samsung and Google apps can be downloaded. Haven't used the 2 MP camera or video recorder yet, but it's enough for me to know it's there when needed.Only drawback for me is keys on the virtual keyboard are compact and I was making a lot of errors with finger-pad input. I switched to a stylus, which is less convenient, but far much more efficient.Equipped my device with optional accessories, a 16GB microSDHC card (up to 32GB can be added) and a case. The S5301L surface is smooth and shiny; I like the feel of the Einzige slim-fit protective case that I bought.

Reviews.Title: Excellent equipment and good performance.
Reviews.Author: M. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Great Phone. camera is ok not big deal. A little too small for typing. I finally got rid of my BB. I miss how easy it was to type but since I bought this phone is being on. My old BB needed to be rebooted every 2 days

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: T. R. "T.R."
Reviews.Content: I have a samsung G S3, but I wanted a phone to use when traveling, and this works well, fulfills its function, but if you used it as your primary phone, also recommend it, the price is good.

Reviews.Title: lemon
Reviews.Author: sw
Reviews.Content: Seems like I got  a defective one. When viewing new text messages the phone will skip the message and go straight to REPLY. Another glitch: sometimes, it won't delete selected emails.  I'll need to delete the same email message multiple times. Otherwise phone seems OK.

Reviews.Title: Samung Galaxy Pocket Plus S5301 3G,2MP,WIFI, 4GB,Ice Cream Sandwich
Reviews.Author: Deon Segree
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son and he loves it. I like the phone a lot but I think that it could be much bigger.

Reviews.Title: Pocket
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: So far so good ! Not 5 because anything Is perfect ! But It's a good telephone. Thank you. Regards.

Reviews.Title: outstanding
Reviews.Author: Lj Johnson
Reviews.Content: Its no samsung s3 or 4 but its features are still outstanding!!!!!!!! At first I thought I waz going 2 b disappointed but I waz shown better, I got more dan my moneys worth!! Its super!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: G. Yau "TY"
Reviews.Content: The phone is easy to use and sound look good. Only issue to screen too small and cannot zoom bigger

Reviews.Title: i dont have useful info
Reviews.Author: dawn
Reviews.Content: i received this product in the timely fashion which i have found typical of prime... physically the product appeared to be in new condition as advertised and had the features listed in the description...my service provider was unable to accomodate this device through no fault of the device... it turns out that my very economical service has some pretty janky limitations and i had to return the device unused... and that is not of any help to you ... sorry about that

Reviews.Title: Frustrating
Reviews.Author: C. Meyer
Reviews.Content: I returned this item as it would shut off intermittently and seemed to have a mind of it's own.  The screen is almost too small to be usable for texting.
